QuestData.Title: Mobilize Maldraxxus
QuestData.Description:
It will be difficult to reach Kel'Thuzad while he is in his necropolis.
Go now. It will take time for us to muster an army that can pierce his defenses.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Draka in the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.RewardText:
Our forces stand ready.
Let us end this.
